question: my 21/2 yr old has a rare undiagnosed form of Lypodystropy ( Diagnosed just after turning 2).Symptoms: Bruising turns into skin indentations which eats away her fat tissue. Only on her arms & legs at this stage. Frequent Blood Noses.Please note: i have an 11 yr old daughter who has autoimmune lypodystrophy which has caused diabetes type1, Autoimmune Hepatitis of Liver. Loss of fat over body but has pregnacy type belly. She was diagnosed at 18mths.Thank you
title: Bruising / Skin Indentations / fat loss
